dict.string: The app version has been updated. Discarding aborted data and returning to the home screen.
Unable to resume quest due to an unexpected error with aborted data. Returning to the home screen.
Multiplayer session was aborted due to a break in the connection. This quest was aborted with no remaining units. You cannot resume this quest. Returning to the home screen.

Multiplayer session was aborted due to a break in the connection. (Current energy: <font color="blue">%d</font> / Max energy: <font color="blue">%d</font>) Your maximum energy isn't sufficient to resume this quest. Unable to resume quest.
Your last quest attempt was aborted. Resume where you left off?
<font color="red">This is a locked quest.</font> Aborting play will result in its being locked again. Are you sure you want to abort?
You've reached the maximum number of aborts allowed. Returning to the home screen without resuming quest.
Your last quest attempt was aborted. Resume where you left off? (You can resume <font color="red">%d</font> more times.) This quest has a limited number of retries.

Multiplayer session was aborted due to a break in the connection. You can resume this quest at a cost of <font color="red">%d</font> energy units. (Current energy: <font color="blue">%d</font> / Max energy: <font color="blue">%d</font>) Resume quest?

<font color="red">You don't have enough energy. <font color="red">You can fully recover your energy for <font color="red">1</font> Polgyon. Recover energy? (Current Polygons: <font color="blue">%d</font>)
<font color="red">You don't have enough Polygons. </font>Purchase Polygons?

Raid Quest Completed.
Return to Home screen.
IMPORTANT: This quest was aborted with no remaining units. Upon resuming the quest, <font color="red">continues</font> can be bought for the price of <font color="red">1</font> Polygon.
(You have <font color="red">%d</font> more continues.)
In the event another player resumes play just before you, gameplay will be picked up from where you left off.
The app version has been updated. Discarding aborted data and moving to multiplayer.
Unable to move to multiplayer due to aborted data from your last game session. Delete aborted data?

<font color="red">Raid Quest</font>
Energy is consumed if quest is stopped.
Stop quest?

<font color="red">Raid Quest</font>
Raid Quest Key cannot be returned if quest is stopped.
Stop quest?

<font color="red">Raid Quest</font>
Even if you quit Energy is used.
Quit?

<font color="red">Raid Quest</font>
Even if you quit Raid Key is used.
Quit?

<font color="red">This quest has a play limit</font>
Even if you quit It is counted against the limit
Quit?
